column4: help ?.. when up scrolling with mouse in firefox i get the panel menu popping up.. it is very annoying " can i shut this off"
don't think it a problem with firefox.. it must some setting in ubuntu but i can't seem to find it

i had a mouse that was sensitive on the wheel.  when i'd scroll up it would think i did a wheel click.  i had to get a new mouse to get it to stop.
